title: Events Calendar | American Museum of Natural History
description: Take part in an engaging, thought-provoking program at the Museum.
cleaned_text: Calendar [Member Programs Central Park Bird Walks Join a Museum ornithologist on a walking tour to observe the vibrant fall migration of birds in Central Park. Eight Weekdays September-October, 2023](/calendar/bird-walks-central-park) [Planetarium Programs Astronomy Live: Earth, The Transiting Exoplanet Which stars have the perfect stadium-seating vantage point in the galaxy to find and study Earth? Tuesday, September 19, 2023](/calendar/earth-transiting-exoplanet) [Event The Oedipus Project Join a conversation about the climate crisis, following a dramatic live reading of Oedipus the King by acclaimed actors. Wednesday, September 20, 2023 | Sold Out](/calendar/oedipus-project-climate-crisis) [Special Events Family Party A beloved Museum tradition featuring hands-on learning experiences, behind-the-scenes access, live music, and more. Tuesday, October 17, 2023](/calendar/family-party) [Member Programs Member Hours Off-hours access for Members and their guests. Thursday, October 19, 2023](/calendar/member-hours) [Event Spooky Space Join astronomer Jackie Faherty on a spine-tingling journey through eerie celestial realms in the Hayden Planetarium.
